AI Description: JBIG-KIT is a software implementation of the JBIG1 data compression standard for bi-level images.
Core Features: JBIG-KIT provides tools for compressing and decompressing bi-level images in the JBIG1 format. It is designed to achieve high compression ratios for binary images, making it suitable for applications where storage or transmission bandwidth is a concern.
General Tags: Data Compression, Image Processing, Software Development
